hero.title: Zenless Zone Zero Characters
hero.tagline: Dive into the thrilling world of Zenless Zone Zero, a post-apocalyptic action RPG where you fight alongside powerful Agents to reclaim the city from the Hollows. Explore our comprehensive character list to discover your perfect team!

cards.heading: Explore the Agents
cards.text: Zenless Zone Zero features a diverse cast of Agents, each with unique abilities and fighting styles. Explore our character list to discover their backstories, strengths, and weaknesses. Find the perfect team for your playstyle and conquer the Hollows!

how_it_works.title: How to Use Our Character List
how_it_works.text: Using our character list is simple and straightforward.  Follow these steps to find the perfect Agents for your team:

s1.title: Browse by Faction
s1.description: Select a faction from the list to view all the Agents belonging to that group.

s2.title: Filter by Attribute
s2.description: Use the attribute filter to narrow down your search to Agents with specific elemental powers.

s3.title: Read Agent Details
s3.description: Click on an Agent's name to view their detailed information, including their backstory, abilities, and fighting style.

features_leftright.heading: Features
features_leftright.text: Zenless Zone Zero offers an array of exciting features that enhance your gameplay experience. Discover the unique aspects that make this game stand out.

feature1.heading: Diverse Character Roster
feature1.text: Zenless Zone Zero boasts a diverse roster of characters, each with unique abilities and backstories. Whether you prefer close-quarters combat or long-range attacks, there's a character to suit your playstyle.
feature1.image_alt: An image showcasing the diverse characters in Zenless Zone Zero

feature2.heading: Engaging Storyline
feature2.text: Dive into a rich and engaging storyline set in the futuristic city of New Eridu.
feature2.image_alt: An image depicting the storyline and setting of Zenless Zone Zero

items.title: Realistic Text-to-Speech
items.description: Make your audio generated by AI sound like a real person with human-like intonations and pauses.

items.title: Language Support
items.description: Break the language barrier with our dual language support for English and Chinese.

items.title: Well-Trained
items.description: Rest assured in the efficiency of ChatTTS, designed from over 40,000 hours of pre training

items.title: Open-Source
items.description: Get access to well-maintained and regularly updated source code on GitHub.

cta.heading: Ready to Conquer the Hollows?
cta.text: Dive into the world of Zenless Zone Zero today! Explore our character list and build the ultimate team to reclaim the city.

faq2col.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq2col.text: We've compiled a list of frequently asked questions about Zenless Zone Zero and our character list.

faq1.question: What is Zenless Zone Zero?
faq1.answer: Zenless Zone Zero is a post-apocalyptic action RPG set in a world where the city of New Eridu is constantly threatened by the Hollows, monstrous creatures from another dimension. Players take on the role of a 'Proxy,' a specialized combatant who fights alongside powerful Agents to reclaim the city.

faq2.question: What are Agents?
faq2.answer: Agents are playable characters in Zenless Zone Zero, each with unique abilities, fighting styles, and backstories. They are essential for defeating the Hollows and protecting the city.

faq3.question: How do I use your character list?
faq3.answer: Our character list is designed to help you find the perfect Agents for your team. You can browse by faction, filter by attribute, and read detailed information on each Agent. It's a great resource for making informed decisions about your team composition.

faq4.question: Is your character list updated regularly?
faq4.answer: Yes, our character list is updated regularly with the latest information on all playable Agents and upcoming characters. You can always rely on it for accurate data.

footer.text: Zenless Zone Zero Characters: Your ultimate guide to Agents, abilities, and game tips.
